thread.title: Pawel Zadrozny
thread.title_full: Freeze Pro Shop reviewed by Pawel Zadrozny

author: Pawel Zadrozny
title: Pawel Zadrozny
text: Ordered lens for my goggles, shipped to Japan in 5 days. Unfortunately it arrived all scratched but the customer service was so great that they sent me a brand new one right away. A week later got Marker Kingpin bindings and they shipped even faster. I don't know how you guys do it but you're faster and cheaper than Japanese online stores :)
